about_the_game:
Goblin's Journey is a humorous point & click adventure game with a stupid plot and even more idiotic characters.
You play as a greedy bastard goblin named Alastar. You are about to save you king's life - in exchange for gold of course!
An adventure full of gold, mischief and innapropriate content.

Explore the vast country of Goblin Lands in this semi-open world adventure, visit also Human Lands (ew!) and if you are lucky enough you get to see the beauties of hell as well!

Make money by doing all kinds of (il)legal stuff, and then use the money to buy some cool items for you including collectible cards and other keepsakes! If you are lucky enough you can even buy your own apartment.

Make sure all your kids are asleep before you start playing!

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains bad language and use of alcohol.

detailed_description:
Goblin's Journey is a humorous point & click adventure game with a stupid plot and even more idiotic characters.
You play as a greedy bastard goblin named Alastar. You are about to save you king's life - in exchange for gold of course!
An adventure full of gold, mischief and innapropriate content.

Explore the vast country of Goblin Lands in this semi-open world adventure, visit also Human Lands (ew!) and if you are lucky enough you get to see the beauties of hell as well!

Make money by doing all kinds of (il)legal stuff, and then use the money to buy some cool items for you including collectible cards and other keepsakes! If you are lucky enough you can even buy your own apartment.

Make sure all your kids are asleep before you start playing!
name: Goblin's Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 300 MHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 & up
  • Processor: 1 GHz & up
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
